name: Knives War
description:
*** Download for FREE now!
Knives War - an exciting great knife game, shoot the knives to win the huge reward and pass the level.

Knives War provides the challenging gameplay of knife shooting and hitting. Trust yourself to refresh your best record.

Do not hesitate, start to throw the knife now! You’ll be the MASTER of the knife!

_
Why play Knives War:
*Very easy tap to enjoy the fun of realistic knife hitting!
*10+ various knives to unlock! New Update very SOON!!!
*Use different knives,Rocket,Weapons wisely to finish your target efficiently!
*Try it now to see how many levels you can pass.

Time to throw your knife! Hit all targets! Be the greatest Warrior of the knife!
